DOC.brief_summary: This research study compare two weight loss program provide different recommendation reduce energy ( calorie ) intake achieve weight loss effort determine fix calorie reduction vary calorie reduction effective weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: CARE Trial : Comparing Different Levels Calorie Reduction Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: Age 2175 Body mass index ( BMI ) 3050 kg/m2 Uncontrolled hypertension ( blood pressure > 160/100 mm Hg ) Any follow medical condition : myocardial infarction cerebrovascular accident within last six month ; unstable angina within past six month ; congestive heart failure ; cancer require treatment past five year ( exception : nonmelanoma skin cancer ) ; serious infectious disease ( e.g. , selfreported HIV ) ; chronic hepatitis ; cirrhosis ; chronic malabsorption syndrome ; chronic pancreatitis ; chronic lung disease orthopedic problem limit physical activity Current use follow medication : antipsychotic agent , monoamine oxidase inhibitor , systemic corticosteroid , antibiotic HIV TB , chemotherapeutic drug ; prescription weight loss medication ( past six month ) Unwilling unable following : give informed consent ; read English 5th grade level ; accept random assignment ; travel intervention site Likely relocate area next 2 year Participation another randomize research project Weight loss > 10 pound past six month History bariatric surgery Major depressive psychiatric disorder , excessive alcohol intake Potential participant live far 30 mile drive distance UAB exclude study . Potential participant ( female ) pregnant plan become pregnant next 18 month exclude participation study . This weight loss study weight gain/loss due pregnancy and/or delivery would confound study result . Additionally , weight loss recommend pregnant woman .
